error: 
  --> SQL:1:1
  |
1 | get(create_array(1, 2), 2)
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ index out of bounds: the len is 2 but the index is 2



error: 
  --> SQL:1:1
  |
1 | get(create_array(a, b), idx)
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ index out of bounds: the len is 2 but the index is 2



error: 
  --> SQL:1:1
  |
1 | CAST(a AS UINT16)
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ unable to cast -4 to UInt16
